text: @NYCMayor Don’t go into the water during Memorial Day weekend, but by all means let thousands of people converge in one area. I can only assume when there’s a spike in Covid19 it’ll be Trumps fault. Then they’ll demand his help and bitch they’re not getting enough. You’re an ass.
